name: Suzie Doll's Very First Video Game Demo
name_original: Suzie Doll's Very First Video Game Demo
description:
This is a short danmaku game demo starring Suzie Doll. Move Suzie with the arrow keys. Hold down Z to move her more precisely and give her bullets a lock-on effect that makes it easier to hit bosses from far away.

Depending on the response this demo gets, we might make a full-length game. Your comments and suggestions are very welcome.

Suzie Doll on Flickr: https://www.flickr.com/photos/suzie_doll/
Suzie Doll on deviantArt: https://www.deviantart.com/dollyca
Suzie Doll on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFxAJYb-A7kRCjmUIPO1-BA
